summary: This fix allows custom races and vampires to complete the Dark Brotherhood Quest "To Kill an Empire" (DB09)
descriptionHtml:
This is a very simple fix that allows a player to continue through the Dark Brotherhood quests if they've contracted vampirism or are using a custom race. Usually the game holds you hostage in the castle, as Gianna, the castle chef, refuses to recognize you if you are anything but one of the non-vampiric Vanilla Races. This refusal of recognition ends up being a greater threat to the Dhovakhin's ascendancy to power than all the dragons put together. This fix merely tells her to recognize you if you are anything BUT a non-vampiric vanilla race.

If you are playing in a way that does not neccessitate this mod (non-vampiric vanilla race), the mod will not affect you in any way.

There are other mods that also fix this bug, in slightly different fashion, but as effectively:
Higher Magic DB CookQuest Fix :
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10770
and
Expired's custom race fix:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10165
author: shades
